sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of United Technologies ( UTX ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.9%.
Year to date, United Technologies has lost about 12.8% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading down 3.8%.
Procter & Gamble is lower by about 14.8% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Boeing ( BA ), trading down 1.1%, and Intel Corp ( INTC ), trading up 0.7% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
